timeline.bodyText: When null == sqlException.getSQLState() , null == sqlException.getCause() but cause.getMessage() could run well, right?
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText:
Sorry, I did not catch you.
Which condition will make sqlException.getCause isNull ?
replies.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText:
@cmonkey Sorry?
Or what's the difference between sqlException.getCause().getMessage() and cause.getMessage()?
replies.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText:
val exception = new SQLException()
MySQLErrPacketFactory.newInstance(1, exception)
cause.isInstanceOf[SQLException) is true
cause.asInstanceOF[SQLException) to  sqlException
sqlException.SQLState is null
sqlException.cuase is not null
sqlException.getCuase is null
MySQLErrPacketFactory.newInstance throw NPE, write errorPacket failed, Connection is hung
replies.author: cmonkey
